name: Dream Your Wings
description:
Content Warning: Plummeting from great heights and sometimes flickering images when you collide with objects.

Spread your wings wide and learn to fly on a peaceful snowy night in this single-player 3D flying game!  Glide through a beautiful, randomly-generated cityscape, strengthening your wings with every attempt until you're soaring over rooftops!

To play, use your keyboard to tilt forward and backward to pick up speed and stay aloft, and use your wings to propel yourself even higher!  Dive closer to the ground to pick up more speed and glide farther faster, or stay at a slower speed high up to avoid the sharp turns, dead ends, and many other obstacles in the street.

Fly through a randomly generated environment that is never the same twice and stretches infinitely in every direction!  The only limit to your trip through the skies is the strength of your wings.  Who knows, fly far enough and you might even find somewhere special...

So keep on trying, keep flying farther and getting stronger every time, never give up, and dream your wings!

If you experience motion sickness, you can turn off the dynamic camera in the options menu for a smoother flight.
